mdRecord.dcterms:description: A name and expression of presence, Greek society initials, expression of love, variations on an old adage as repeated in the movie "The Shining" [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
